articles.author: Tim Mullaney
articles.title: How Netflix can end the Hollywood strike in a way Disney, Paramount can't afford - CNBC
articles.description: Wall Street believes the Netflix financial outlook gives it more room to make a deal with Hollywood actors and writers than legacy entertainment companies.
